üìã Overview

Use standard ground-level photos to detect and measure your tower equipment in minutes. Telescope provides instant visibility into your installed inventory‚Äîfor accurate billing and wind load assessment without ever launching a drone.

Key Benefit: Transform ordinary ground-level photos into billing-ready, ERP-synced tower inventories using advanced AI and computer vision.

Tower companies hosting multiple tenants often struggle with incomplete, outdated, or inaccurate equipment records. Tenants install or modify gear‚Äîsometimes without disclosure‚Äîand billing based on surface area or number of units quickly becomes unreliable.

Manual audits are resource-intensive. Drone inspections are costly, time-consuming, and require specialized post-processing. The result? Missed revenue, operational inefficiency, and compliance risk.

Telescope eliminates these problems with no drones, no delays‚Äîjust accurate insights from your field teams' smartphones or cameras.

‚ö†Ô∏è TowerCo Challenges

üîß Equipment Changes

Tenants install new equipment without always notifying you. Missing equipment records lead to lost revenue and compliance risk.

üöÅ Drone Complexity

Drone inspections are slow, costly, and logistically complex. Traditional methods require specialized equipment, pilots, and weather coordination.

üìä Outdated Records

Outdated records prevent tower optimization. You may think that you have space on the tower but in reality you don't, and vice-versa.

üîÑ How Telescope Works

From photo to inventory‚Äîin minutes.

üìπ Watch the explainer video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sWplvQV09ig
üì±

Capture

Take ground-level photos with a smartphone. No drones, pilots, or special equipment required.

‚Üí
ü§ñ

Detect

Our AI identifies and measures over 200 tower components with 2-inch accuracy‚Äîeven if partially visible.

‚Üí
üîÑ

Reconcile

Instantly sync results with your ERP system or export detailed reports for billing and compliance.

Detailed Process

  1. Capture: Take standard 4K photos from the ground
  2. Upload: Use the web portal or mobile app
  3. Detect: Over 200 types of base station equipment‚Äîpanel antennas, MW antennas, RRUs, and more
  4. Measure: Achieve 2-inch precision, even on tall or obscured installations
  5. Reconcile: Instantly update your ERP (e.g., Tarantula) or generate detailed PDF/CSV reports

üÜö Telescope vs Drone-Based Inspections

See why leading TowerCos are switching to Telescope.

Feature Telescope Drone
Setup Time ‚úì Minutes ‚úó Hours
Required Gear ‚úì Smartphone or DSLR ‚úó Drone, controller
Image Processing ‚úì Lightweight CV (2D) ‚úó 3D mesh, manual QA
Accuracy ‚úì 2 inches ‚úó Varies
Output Format ‚úì ERP-ready report ‚úó Raw media or 3D model
On-Site Safety ‚úì No climb, no flight ‚úó Flight prep + air clearance

Why TowerCos Choose Telescope

‚ö° 7-Minute Site Time

Fast, efficient inspections from ground level eliminate lengthy setup and coordination requirements.

üß† Intelligent Detection

Works even with partial visibility or complex tower structures using advanced computer vision.

Prevent underbilling with complete, up-to-date inventory and precise surface area calculations.

üîó ERP Integration

Seamlessly syncs with your existing asset management systems including Tarantula and others.

üõ°Ô∏è Deployment Options

Available as SaaS or private cloud deployment‚Äîyour data stays yours with enterprise security.

üéØ 2D Precision

No need for complex 3D modeling‚Äîjust 2D photos deliver 2-inch accurate results efficiently.

Integration Capabilities

  • ERP Systems: Direct integration with Tarantula and other major tower management platforms
  • Export Formats: PDF reports, CSV data, and JSON for custom integrations
  • API Access: RESTful API for seamless data exchange with existing systems
  • Mobile & Web: Access via dedicated mobile app or web portal
  • Cloud & On-Premise: Flexible deployment options to meet security requirements
